reviewText: Works fine, but am unable to get my Digital Claim as it is only available in UK and Ireland. :( Kinda anoying as we like collecting everything on Vudu.
Did not realize it can only be watched in 3D.. Can't fault the manufacturer to much but it isn't really clearly stated on description so disappointed

Jurassic world was great and Jurassic park would have been great if it worked . This is the 2nd one I have ordered . The 1st one I had to return because Jurassic park had lines show up in the picture and ghost images and than freeze it was unplayable . This one the same thing it will not work . Jurassic world works great so I do not know what the problem is . I will return this one and buy them separately . It has worked for some but not me .
The 3D on the original Jurassic Park is very well done. Both discs played without any issues. A really good price for these 2 movies.

I can't say if I'm happy with the video or not.  It's 3D and it requires a 3D TV and it's in my plans to purchase one in the near future.  My midline review is from the impression I had that I could download a digital copy and since we do have plans to buy a 3D TV when I placed the order I went ahead with buying the 3D disc.  When I tried to download the digital copy I found out that I could only download the digital copy if I lived in the UK which I do not.
I guess I should have read the fine print better.

If immersion is what makes movies so great then 3D for these two Jurassic movies is without equal. I don't know how Samsung did it but this is the best 3D effect l've ever seen. These Blue ray discs are topnotch quality but l had to use my brand new player.
Out of ALL the innovations in movie viewing the 3D drama here puts the action in the room and IN YOUR FACE.
Great combination.  Excellent 3D movies.  Love both, good story line and great effects.
